content: knitted top in drops belle the piece is worked bottom up in stocking stitch with shaped waistline pattern vs-113 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio 250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 25 forest brown **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
